Package index

Core Gameplay

Main control flow of the Blackjack game.

play()
Play a Full Interactive Game of Blackjack
ask_play_again()
Ask to play again
exit()
Exit Blackjack session

Player Management

Functions for managing and inputting player data.

input_players()
Input and validate human and computer players
get_bets()
Get Bets from Players
player_action()
Player action: hit, stand, or double (with betting)
play_player_turns()
Play player turns for all players

Game Setup and Card Handling

Functions for dealing cards and setting up game state.

setup_and_display_initial()
Set up the game and display initial hands with bets
deal_cards()
Deal initial cards in Blackjack
card()
Create a card vector
new_blackjack_hand()
Create a blackjack hand (S3 vctrs)
card_is_face()
judging J/Q/K
card_is_ace()
judging A (Ace)
card_value()
Obtain the initial points of a single card in Blackjack (ensure J/Q/K == 10，A == 11)
card_suit()
Extract the suit from a card vector
card_rank()
Extract the rank of a card Generic function to extract the rank (e.g., "A", "10", "J") from an object representing a card. This function supports objects of class card or character strings representing cards.
as.character(<card>)
Coerce card vector to character
print(<card>)
Print a card vector

Game Progression

Functions related to splitting, insurance, and gameplay actions.

handle_splitting()
Handle splitting of pairs
handle_insurance()
Handle insurance offers and dealer blackjack check

Outcome and Scoring

Functions for scoring hands and determining winners.

calculate_score()
Calculate Blackjack Score
calculate_score_cpp()
Calculate Blackjack Score (C++)
is_blackjack()
Check if a hand is Blackjack
is_five_card_charlie()
Check 5-card Charlie condition
determine_winner()
Determine winner(s) of a Blackjack game
end_round()
End round processing
display_final_results()
Display final results with betting outcomes

Results and Visualization

Functions to plot or display player and bankroll results.

plot_player_ranking()
Plot current player ranking
plot_bankroll_history()
Plot bankroll history over rounds

Data Management

Save/load/reset player data and session information.

save_players()
Save players and bankroll history to disk
load_players()
Load players and bankroll history from disk
reset_game_data()
Reset game memory: players and/or bankroll history
get_home_dir()
Get the User's Home Directory
players_data
Sample players data for vignette examples

Simulation

Run AI-driven game simulations for strategy analysis.

simulate_blackjack()
Simulate Blackjack games with customizable hit, insurance, and split strategies
